what_is.title: What is CI/CD?
what_is.content: Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) is a method to frequently deliver apps to customers by introducing automation into the stages of app development. The main concepts attributed to CI/CD are continuous integration, continuous delivery, and continuous deployment.

key_components.title: Key Components
items: Version Control: Git repositories for tracking changes
Automated Testing: Unit tests, integration tests
Build Automation: Automated compilation and packaging
